alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, Baker, east central Columbia, west central Duval and southeastern Charlton Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1145 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of St. George to Taylor to near Olustee. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Taylor, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Olustee, St. George, Sanderson, Bryceville and Baldwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
